data.name: Cosmic Ghost Rider
data.description: Spirit of Vengeance, Herald of Galactus, and intergalactic biker, Frank Castle rides across the universe seeking a Thanos who turned his Earth into a wasteland.

starItems.name: Cosmic Ghost Rider
starItems.description: Spirit of Vengeance, Herald of Galactus, and intergalactic biker, Frank Castle rides across the universe seeking a Thanos who turned his Earth into a wasteland.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color> and this character is not at full energy:
 > If the primary target is a <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to primary target.
 > Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for this character and all <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> allies who were not at full energy on start of this turn.

This attack cannot be dodged.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color> and this character is not at full energy:
 > If the primary target is a <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to primary target.
 > Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for this character and all <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> allies who were not at full energy on start of this turn.

This attack cannot be dodged.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color> and this character is not at full energy:
 > If the primary target is a <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to primary target.
 > Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for this character and all <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> allies who were not at full energy on start of this turn.

This attack cannot be dodged.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary and secondary targets

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color> and this character is not at full energy:
 > If the primary target is a <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to primary target.
 > Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for this character and all <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> allies who were not at full energy on start of this turn.

This attack cannot be dodged.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color> and this character is not at full energy:
 > If the primary target is a <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to primary target.
 > Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for this character and all <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> allies who were not at full energy on start of this turn.

This attack cannot be dodged.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>10%</color> per positive effect on primary target

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>10%</color> per positive effect on primary target.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color> and this character is not at full energy:
 > If the primary target is a <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to primary target.
 > Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for this character and all <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> allies who were not at full energy on start of this turn.

This attack cannot be dodged.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Damage is increased by +<color=#86e619>15%</color> per positive effect on primary target

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per positive effect on primary target.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color> and this character is not at full energy:
 > If the primary target is a <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to primary target.
 > Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for this character and all <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> allies who were not at full energy on start of this turn.

This attack cannot be dodged.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.
Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per positive effect on primary target.

Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects into negative effects on all enemies. Flip all positive effects on all <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> enemies instead.

This attack gains <color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus against <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> enemies and cannot be dodged or counterattacked.

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per positive effect on primary target.

Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects into negative effects on all enemies. Flip all positive effects on all <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> enemies instead.

This attack gains <color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus against <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> enemies and cannot be dodged or counterattacked.

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.
Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per positive effect on primary target.

Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects into negative effects on all enemies. Flip all positive effects on all <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> enemies instead.

This attack gains <color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus against <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> enemies and cannot be dodged or counterattacked.

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per positive effect on primary target.

Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects into negative effects on all enemies. Flip all positive effects on all <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> enemies instead.

This attack gains <color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus against <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> enemies and cannot be dodged or counterattacked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to all enemies
Clear all Battlefield Effects on the allied side

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.
Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per positive effect on primary target.

Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects into negative effects on all enemies. Flip all positive effects on all <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> enemies instead.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to all enemies.

Clear all Battlefield Effects on the allied side.

This attack gains <color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus against <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> enemies and cannot be dodged or counterattacked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> with the highest Speed, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.
Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per positive effect on primary target.

Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects into negative effects on all enemies. Flip all positive effects on all <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> enemies instead.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to all enemies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> with the highest Speed, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Clear all Battlefield Effects on the allied side.

This attack gains <color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus against <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> enemies and cannot be dodged or counterattacked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>125%</color> damage to all enemies
If the enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> with the highest Speed, has <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to that character

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>425%</color> damage.
Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per positive effect on primary target.

Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects into negative effects on all enemies. Flip all positive effects on all <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> enemies instead.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to all enemies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> with the highest Speed, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>. If that enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> has <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>.

Clear all Battlefield Effects on the allied side.

This attack gains <color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus against <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> enemies and cannot be dodged or counterattacked.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.
Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per positive effect on primary target.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and cannot be blocked.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack cannot be dodged or counterattacked.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing.
Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per positive effect on primary target.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and cannot be blocked.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack cannot be dodged or counterattacked.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing.
Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per positive effect on primary target.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and cannot be blocked.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack cannot be dodged or counterattacked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to primary target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing.
Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per positive effect on primary target.

Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to primary target.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and cannot be blocked.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack cannot be dodged or counterattacked.
4.nextUpgrade:
Clear all Barrier on primary target
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary target

5.description:
Clear all Barrier on primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing.
Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per positive effect on primary target.

Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to primary target.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and cannot be blocked.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack cannot be dodged or counterattacked.

6.description:
Clear all Barrier on primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>400%</color> Piercing.
Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per positive effect on primary target.

Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to primary target.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and cannot be blocked.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack cannot be dodged or counterattacked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to primary target
Clear all Battlefield Effects on the enemy side

7.description:
Clear all Barrier on primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>500%</color> Piercing.
Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per positive effect on primary target.

Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to primary target.

Clear all Battlefield Effects on the enemy side.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and cannot be blocked.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack cannot be dodged or counterattacked.

1.description: After an enemy uses an Ultimate Ability, if this character is not <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
1.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, lower the Focus by <color=#86e619>5,000%</color> and Damage by <color=#86e619>50%</color> for any non-Mephisto enemy that takes a turn before this character or any ally

2.description:
After an enemy uses an Ultimate Ability, if this character is not <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, lower the Focus by <color=#86e619>5,000%</color> and Damage by <color=#86e619>50%</color> for any non-Mephisto enemy that takes a turn before this character or any ally.
2.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> allies, enemy Speed Bar that is gained on Spawn is increased by <color=#86e619>100%</color>

3.description:
After an enemy uses an Ultimate Ability, if this character is not <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Lower the Focus by <color=#86e619>5,000%</color> and Damage by <color=#86e619>50%</color> for any non-Mephisto enemy that takes a turn before this character or any ally.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> allies, enemy Speed Bar that is gained on Spawn is increased by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health

4.description:
After an enemy uses an Ultimate Ability, if this character is not <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Lower the Focus by <color=#86e619>5,000%</color> and Damage by <color=#86e619>50%</color> for any non-Mephisto enemy that takes a turn before this character or any ally.
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> allies, enemy Speed Bar that is gained on Spawn is increased by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
Barrier for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health
Gain +<color=#86e619>200%</color> Focus
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus per <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> ally

5.description:
After an enemy uses an Ultimate Ability, if this character is not <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> allies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>200%</color> Focus.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Lower the Focus by <color=#86e619>5,000%</color> and Damage by <color=#86e619>50%</color> for any non-Mephisto enemy that takes a turn before this character or any ally.
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus per <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> ally.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> allies, enemy Speed Bar that is gained on Spawn is increased by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
